description: Breakfast and brunch are sorted with this easy pancake recipe. This quick recipe creates soft and fluffy pancakes the whole family will enjoy. Have fun choosing your perfect topping - from in-season fruit to sticky maple syrup and fried bacon. Yum.
name: Easy Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a frying pan over medium heat. Brush pan with a little melted butter, then pour 1/4 cup batter into pan, carefully spreading to form a 12cm round. Cook for 2 minutes or until bubbles appear. Turn over and cook for 2 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a plate and cover with a tea towel to keep warm. Repeat with remaining batter, brushing pan with melted butter when necessary. Serve.
